titleStmt.title: [Almanake and pronostication for the yeare of our lorde MCCCCC, and XXXVII]
titleStmt.author: Seyfridt, George.

notesStmt.note: Author, imprint and publication date from STC; title from Bosanquet.
Bosanquet, E.F. Almanacks, p. 148, no. cxxxii.
Identified as STC 416 on UMI microfilm reel 21.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 21 (British Library copy) and at reel 71 (Bodleian Library copy).
